text: Do h2oai benchmarks compare reading formats in CSV and Arrow? It seems like Polars is using Arrow under the hood all the time, and not parsing CSVs

no, this is all once the data is read in.

I'm not sure what format the data is in originally, though, but i dont think it would affect poler's performance.

text: It's in CSV AFAIK (at least for Julia). This is quite good for us since we use `PooledArray` when appropriate, which makes grouping quite fast.
